name: zonaenglish-ambassador-landing
description: Single-page React landing site for ZonaEnglish School Ambassador recruitment program

brandColors.description: Navy blue primary, yellow accent for CTAs

components.cards: rounded-3xl border shadow-sm with gradient backgrounds
components.responsive: Mobile-first with sm:, md:, lg: breakpoints

keyFiles.App.tsx: Main component file (~1000+ lines) - contains all UI sections, modals, forms
keyFiles.code.md: Reference document - draft component code (not active)
keyFiles.tambahan.md: Content requirements - mindset, tasks, schools list

developmentGuidelines.architecture: Keep everything in App.tsx unless explicitly asked to refactor
developmentGuidelines.styling: Use Tailwind utility classes, maintain brand colors
developmentGuidelines.animations: Use Framer Motion for transitions and modals
developmentGuidelines.typeScript: Strict mode enabled, no unused vars/params allowed
developmentGuidelines.forms: All forms submit to WhatsApp with formatted messages

criticalPaths: WhatsApp link generation with correct formatting

deployment.envVars: none - all URLs hardcoded in constants
